resources.string: "5 Exercises will be selected randomly \n\nYou can shuffle the list if you don't like recommended exercises"

License for every asset(Image, Music) is either free to use or purchased. It took me almost 10 days to build this app from complete scratch\n\nAs challenge recommends to put up a price in about section of app so I would like to charge 0.00$ for this app. Anyone is allowed to use this app for internal use ;) Oh yes of course is available on Github check out my Pinned repositories
This project was made as a coding challenge by Hitesh Chaudhary Click on the icon below to watch complete challenge
